---
title: "run_custom"
description: "Run an custom agent with the specified request parameters"
---

and wait for completion Note: not all servers support custom agents


## Parameters

<ParamField path="request" type="BaseModel">

</ParamField>

<ParamField path="parallel_attempts" type="int">
   (default: 1)
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`AgentStatusResponse`](../misc/agentstatusresponse)
